meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6997.

td.p: Michael Jones, a middle school special education teacher from Madison, Wisconsin
Cathy Farrell, a high school science teacher from Wyandotte, Michigan
Lydia Cuffman, a high school history teacher from Redwood City, California

tr.td: TV: A NICE PLACE TO START
PRESIDENTIAL MOMS
THAT'S A REALLY GOOD QUESTION
OH, THERE'S THE BELL
TIME FOR RE-"CESS"
